paper_abstract: Given a convex disk K and a positive integer k, let and denote the k-fold translative covering density and the k-fold lattice covering density of K, respectively. Let T be a triangle. In a very recent paper, Sriamorn , 2014) proved that . In this paper, we will show that upsilon(K)(T)(T) = upsilon(k)(L)(T).
paper_title: On the Multiple Covering Densities of Triangles
